C

clear(String) - Method in class config.Configuration
Clears the content of the specified file.
collectInputAndSave(String) - Static method in class input.CommandLineInput
Collects input for event details, vendor, and customer configurations from the user and saves the details to a config file.
CommandLineInput - Class in input
The CommandLineInput class provides functionality to prompt users to configure the ticket pool system by collecting event details, vendor and customer information, and saving them to a configuration file, inorder to simulate a multithreaded environment
CommandLineInput() - Constructor for class input.CommandLineInput
 
config - package config
 
Configuration - Class in config
The Configuration class basically creates the structure of the config file including ticket pool, vendors, and customers.
Configuration() - Constructor for class config.Configuration
 
ConfigurationException - Exception in exceptions
 
ConfigurationException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.ConfigurationException
 
core - package core
 
Customer - Class in threads
The Customer class represents a customer attempting to purchase tickets from a TicketPool.
Customer(int, String, int) - Constructor for class threads.Customer
Constructs a Customer object with the specified customer ID, name, and ticket batch size.
Customer(TicketPool, int, String, int) - Constructor for class threads.Customer
Constructs a Customer object with the specified ticket pool, customer ID, name, and ticket batch size.
customerList - Static variable in class input.CommandLineInput
A list to store the customer details collected.
